sentence.Network_en: I was living in cloud-cuckoo-land about my salary expectations.
sentence.Network_cn: 我对自己的薪水充满了不切实际的幻想。

sentence.Network_en: The cuckoo lays its eggs in other birds'nests.
sentence.Network_cn: 杜鹃在别的鸟巢中产卵.

sentence.Network_en: In England the cuckoo is the herald of spring.
sentence.Network_cn: 在英国杜鹃鸟是报春的使者.

means.word_mean: 1. a bee that is parasitic in the nests of bumblebees

auth_sentence.content: Like the cuckoo, its young develop in others' nests.

auth_sentence.content: The cuckoo is one of our most widespread and familiar summer birds.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The cuckoo is one of our most widespread and familiar summer birds.
